articles.title: Queen Elizabeth's Glittering United Kingdom Brooches Go on Display for the First Time - Town & Country
articles.description: Four brooches representing England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland will form part of a Windsor exhibition celebrating the Queen’s coronation in her Platinum Jubilee year.
